description: Episode of Series "This Modern Age". A study of the strategic, political, economic and social situation of Hong Kong. Stresses its relationship to China; its ties, through trade, with the rest of the world; its vital importance in Far Eastern affairs; its administrative and social difficulties owing to over-population. Scenes of the port, vegetable growing and marketing, factories, shipyards, the airfield, water reservoirs, the fishing industry. Illustrations of its political, housing, medical, educational and military problems.
